title: Selaila Veedu Kattava Lyrics Aval Varuvala
stanzas:
<div>
<div>
Selaila Veedu Kattava Lyrics Aval Varuvala

Selaiyila veedu kattavaa
serndhu vasikka.
janna vachcha jacket
podava thendral adikka

mookkuthiyin minnal
oru deepan yetrivaithu poga
sokkukindra vetkam
vandhu vannam kolam
ondru poda.

Selaiyila veedu kattavaa
serndhu vasikka.
janna vachcha jacket
podava thendral adikka

thavani nazhuvinaal
idhayamum nazhuvuthe
asanthathum un vizhi
azhaginai thiruduthe (2)

oaviyathai thirai maraivil
olithu vaipathaenammaa
katru mazhi chaaralile
nanaiyavittaal niyaayamaa

rasikka vandha
rasiganin vizhigalil moodathe
vizhiyai moodum podhilum
viralgalaale thedaathe.

Selaiyila veedu kattavaa
serndhu vasikka.
janna vachcha jacket
podava thendral adikka

manmadhan sannidhi
mudhan murai paarkiren
athanaal thaanadi
paniyilum verkiren (2)

muththangalin osaigale
poojai mani aanathe.
sevvidhazhin eerangale
theertham endru thonuthe.

kaala neram enbathu
kadhalil illaiyaa
kaama dhevan koyilil
gadikarangal thevaiyaa

Selaiyila veedu kattavaa
serndhu vasikka.
janna vachcha jacket
podava thendral adikka

mookkuthiyin minnal
oru deepan yetrivaithu poga
sokkukindra vetkam
vandhu vannam kolam
ondru poda.
